testcase.name: TC_01 User Registration
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to url 'URL' in browser......................................passed And Verify that home page is visible successfully...........................passed Then Click on 'Signup / Login' button.......................................passed And Verify that 'New User Signup!' is visible...............................passed And Enter name and email address............................................passed Then Click 'Signup' button..................................................passed And Verify that 'Enter Account Information' is visible......................passed Then Fill details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth..............passed And Select checkbox 'Sign up for our newsletter!'...........................passed Then Select checkbox 'Receive special offers from our partners!'............passed And Fill details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed Then Click 'Create Account' button..........................................passed And Verify that 'Account Created!' is visible...............................passed Then Click 'Continue' button................................................passed And Verify that 'Logged in as' is visible...................................passed Then Click ' Delete Account' button.........................................passed And Verify that "ACCOUNT DELETED!" is visible and click "Continue" button...passed

testcase.name: TC_02 Login User with correct email and password
